name: BigCommerce
description: Integrate with BigCommerce to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Products
tools.description: List products in the BigCommerce store. Returns product names, prices, SKUs, and availability.

tools.name: Create Product
tools.description: Create a new product in the BigCommerce store. Provide a name, price, type, and weight.

tools.name: List Orders
tools.description: List orders from the BigCommerce store. Optionally filter by status or date range.

tools.name: List Customers
tools.description: List customers in the BigCommerce store. Optionally filter by email or name.

tools.name: Get Store Info
tools.description: Get general information about the BigCommerce store, including name, domain, plan, and status.

storeHash.label: Store Hash
storeHash.description: Your BigCommerce store hash (found in your API account settings)
